61 template<class Archive, class M>
62 void serializeMatrix(Archive & ar, M &m, const unsigned int version) {
63 
64  for (int j=0; j<m.rows(); ++j) {
65  for (int i=0; i<m.cols(); ++i) {
66  ar & m(j, i);
67  }
68  }
69 }
70 
71 template<class FourColMat>
72 Vector3 transformPoint(const FourColMat &t, const Vector3 &v) {
73  Vector4 v4;
74  v4 << v, 1;
75  v4 = t * v4;
76  return v4.block<3,1>(0,0) / v4[3];
77 }
78 
79 inline Vector3 cross(const Vector &a, const Vector &b) {
80  return Vector3(difference_of_products(a[1], b[2], a[2], b[1]),
81  difference_of_products(a[2], b[0], a[0], b[2]),
82  difference_of_products(a[0], b[1], a[1], b[0]));
83 }
